name: Flibbertigibbet
description:
v0.1.1 fixes some problems where it relied on an obscure DLL for some reason.

A little roguelike thing I threw together in just over a week. (So not a 7DRL, alas.) For ages I've wanted to try making a 2d, turn-based Minecraft thing, and this is the result.

It's super unfinished, as there's not a lot to do and absolutely no point to any of it, BUT you can make a little wooden chair and then sit on it. Given that Minecraft doesn't let you do that, this game is clearly and objectively better than Minecraft and I'm giving it away for free! So, enjoy!
